name: Tank Challenge
overview: Blast your buddy in this Head-To-Head war! Get in or out of your tank, destroy your opponent or walls with TNT explosions, and interact with Lazer Walls that act as doors, shields and even a weapon. Three modes of play: Save the POWs before time runs out, the Most Hits Win or Destroy the Enemy Base! Customize your game with 5 speeds, 32 play arenas, add ricochet bullets or bouncing cannonballs, and more.
